    • Constructor Detail

      • PlatformView

        public PlatformView(UbrosGame game,
                    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureAtlas atlas,
                    ElementBody element,
                    java.lang.String platformView)
        Creates a view belonging to a game.
        Parameters:
        game - The game this view belongs to. Needed to access the asset manager to get textures.
        atlas - The texture atlas associated to this view
        element - The element body associated to this view
        platformView - The name of texture to be drawn in this view
